the 5g paging procedure has been drastically improved compared to the lte paging procedure
paging is nothing but an activity that is carried out by the core network before actually delivering the call or a data
message in the past uh researchers have demonstrated that it's possible it's
possible to track the location of a user by basically observing the paging messages
over a period of time and trying to link the temporary identifiers to the to the users and this way they were able to
calculate precise location of the user which has been demonstrated on 2g and also 4g networks as well
but now with various security improvements the 5g paging procedure is pretty strong um in terms of for example
let's say the paging occasion that used to be calculated based on the mc which
is a permanent identifier which is directly linked to the sim card is now being replaced to

normally paging messages contain either a temporary identifier or in certain cases well we can also call like the

for refreshing the temporary identifier of course like this
